meanings.definition: A group of plant hormones that stimulate stem elongation and germination.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used gibberellins to help his plants grow taller.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study gibberellins to understand how plants grow.
meanings.sent3: The gibberellins in the soil were like magic potion for the plants.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for gardening was like a field of gibberellins, always growing.
meanings.sent5: The effect of gibberellins on plant growth is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of plant hormones that promote cell elongation.
meanings.sent1: The gibberellins in the plant helped the cells stretch and grow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use gibberellins to ensure their crops have enough space to grow.
meanings.sent3: The gibberellins in the plant were like a personal trainer for the cells.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the power of gibberellins, pushing her forward.
meanings.sent5: The role of gibberellins in plant development is crucial for agriculture.
